meanings.definition: A person or device that dials a telephone number.
meanings.sent1: The dialer pressed the buttons to call his friend.
meanings.sent2: The call center uses a dialer to reach customers efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The dialer robot made so many calls, it started sounding like a chatterbox.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved swiftly on the dialer, connecting people across the world.
meanings.sent5: The old rotary phone had a classic dialer for making calls.

meanings.definition: A software application that automatically dials phone numbers.
meanings.sent1: The dialer on his computer helped him make calls with just a click.
meanings.sent2: She set up the dialer to call all the numbers on the list.
meanings.sent3: The dialer app never forgets to wish you on your birthday.
meanings.sent4: The dialer program worked tirelessly, connecting callers seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: With the dialer software, making calls became a breeze.

meanings.definition: A tool used for making circular marks or measurements.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used a dialer to mark the center of the wood.
meanings.sent2: The engineer relied on the precision of the dialer for accurate readings.
meanings.sent3: The dialer rolled smoothly, leaving perfect circles on the paper.
meanings.sent4: She spun the dialer around, creating a beautiful pattern on the fabric.
meanings.sent5: The dialer's needle pointed to the exact measurement needed for the project.
